source_objects.title: Food & Beverage
source_objects.description: Learn how to decorate a cake, prepare a gourmet meal, identify different wine varietals and much more.

items.title: How To Read Italian Wine Labels
items.headline: One of the most overlooked aspects to becoming an Italian Wine Expert is learning how to read Italian wine labels.
objectives_summary: Student will be able to confidently walk into a wine shop and buy a bottle of Italian wine that they've never tasted before.
Students will understand what type of Italian wine they are considering to buy even if they don't speak Italian.

items.title: #1 Learn How To Cook The  Right - No Experience Needed!
items.headline: You Will  Great Results In Your Cooking and Baking Right After The First Session.  Great Ideas For Exact Dinner Recipes.
objectives_summary: You will get over 10 lectures and 3.5 hours of great content.
Better knoledge how to read and understand any recipe easily.
You will learn the exact formula how to get consistent results in your cooking every time.

items.title: Bake Chiffon Cake at Home: The Ultimate Guide
items.headline: Learn how to bake fluffy and moist chiffon cakes from scratch with confidence in this comprehensive beginner's guide.
objectives_summary: Make a wide variety of chiffon cakes from scratch.
Become creative with interesting flavour and texture combinations.
Gain access to downloadable recipes.

items.title: Wine Confidence - Enjoy Wine Without Being An Expert
items.headline: How to Overcome Wine Anxiety... And Finally Enjoy Wine In Business & Social Situations (Without Fear)
objectives_summary: Feel more confident and comfortable around wine.
Skillfully navigate wine lists and impress friends and co-workers with newfound wine savvy.
Understand what matters (and what doesn't) in selecting and enjoying wine

items.title: Beer Types: all you need to know about the most common beers
items.headline: The most entertaining course in the world! Join thousands of students worldwide and become an expert in beer types.
objectives_summary: Learn everything you need to know about the most important beer styles in the world!
Pilsner & Lager
Germany Beer Types

items.title: Basic Thai cooking course by Thai food addict
items.headline: Learn how to make Authentic Thai food with local Thai instructor
objectives_summary: You will learn about Thai ingredients.
You will learn how to basic prepare every Thai ingredients.
You will learn how to make your own Thai curry paste.

items.title: Brewing your Favourite Craft Beers at home, definitive guide

visible_instructors.job_title: Expert Craft Brewer and Cider Maker
visible_instructors.name: Jim
visible_instructors.title: Jim Callender

items.headline: A NEW step by step guide to brewing beers at home. Learn about the ingredients, equipment & methods of making craft beer
objectives_summary: You will gain confidence and expertise  in understanding the brewing process
Learn about the 3 methods of brewing - Kit, Extract, & All Grain
Learn the full steps involved in 'All Grain - Brew In a Bag' (BIAB) method

items.title: Vegan and Gluten-free desserts - easy, yummy, fantastic #1
items.headline: Create exotic and classical vegan and gluten-free desserts, give them your personal touch and a fabulous presentation
objectives_summary: Prepare easy and delicious vegan and gluten-free desserts
Learn about the main vegan substitutes in pastry, how to replace eggs, gelatine ...
Learn about flavours and textures, how to create a well balanced recipe

items.title: Halal food Production and Market Opportunities.

visible_instructors.job_title: Visiting Research Fellow, Huddersfield Business School
visible_instructors.name: Awal
visible_instructors.title: Awal Fuseini

items.headline: Basic principles of Halal food production and how to access the market
objectives_summary: Students will learn the basic principles of Halal food production,
Students will learn about Halal market opportunities and how to tap into the growing Halal market
Students will learn about Halal certification and the factors affecting the choice of Halal certification bodies

items.title: More Thai Cooking Recipes with Chef Kae

visible_instructors.job_title: Owner of a Web Design and Web Development Agency
visible_instructors.name: Bill
visible_instructors.title: Bill Alexander

items.headline: Chef Kae's 3rd and largest Thai cooking course with some special surprises and dishes!
objectives_summary: Learn to prepare and easily cook some traditional Thai dishes
Enjoy the culture of Thailand by learning to cook Thai specialties

items.title: BRANDY - Essentials in Cocktails & Bartending

visible_instructors.job_title: Specialist of Spirits, Certified Sommelier,  Mixologist
visible_instructors.name: Carlos
visible_instructors.title: Carlos Batista

items.headline: - STYLES, BRANDS, FLAVORS & MORE!
objectives_summary: In-depth knowledge of all types of Brandy
Flavors & Aromas
Different styles of Brandy

items.title: Bartender Pro: Become A Hospitality Bartender Today!
items.headline: Learn how to become a professional bartender! In depth, useful content for landing your first bartending job!
objectives_summary: How to quickly become a professional bartender armed with solid fundamental skills that will last
On-the-job training / tips & tricks that you'll be glad you had on your first day
Essential cocktail recipes that you'll be making on a daily basis (and tons more!)

items.title: Handmade Pasta with Chef Giovanni Gaudio
items.headline: Learn to make 3 pastas, their fillings, and their sauces! A step-by-step guide anyone can follow to make fresh pasta
objectives_summary: To see how easy it is to make fresh pasta and amaze your friends and family!
To use the 'well method' for making pasta dough
Find out the proper flour to egg ratio per person for your next dinner

items.title: Cake figurines
items.headline: Easy to understand on making 4 different Princess figurines
objectives_summary: Make edible figurines of cartoon characters
How to make wire support
Creating 4 different hairstyles

items.title: Adventures in Wine Crafting
items.headline: How to make wine in the comfort of your own kitchen
objectives_summary: How to make wine in your own kitchen
Fruits, vegetables, flowers, and herbal tea can make great tasting wine
Determine the potential alcohol content of the wine using a hydrometer and a refractor

items.title: The best three easy recipes of cupcake, salted caramel.
items.headline: for cooking lovers, sweets lovers, for mum who wants surprise their family....for everuone!
objectives_summary: baking cupcakes
making caramel and frosting
proportions of ingredients
